Popular.Title: Two and a Half Men
Popular.description: Charlie Harper is a jingle writer who leads a hedonistic, carefree life. Everything changes when his good-for-nothing brother, Alan, and 10-year-old nephew, Jake, move into his Malibu beach house.

Popular.Title: Brooklyn nine nine
Popular.description: Ray Holt, an eccentric commanding officer, and his diverse and quirky team of odd detectives solve crimes in Brooklyn, New York City.

Popular.Title: Yeh Jawani Hai Diwani
Popular.description: Kabir and Naina meet during a trekking trip where she falls in love with him but refrains from expressing it. They soon drift apart but end up meeting at a friend's wedding.

Popular.Title: Seinfeld
Popular.description: Stand-up comedian Jerry Seinfeld wrestles with life's most perplexing yet trivial questions with his eccentric friends George, Elaine and Kramer.

Popular.Title: The Originals
Popular.description: The Original family of vampires settle down in the city of New Orleans that they helped to construct several decades ago. They encounter old buddies and confront new foes.

Popular.Title: Johnny English 1
Popular.description: An evil smuggler plans to steal the Crown Jewels of the United Kingdom. After the country's top agents are killed, the only remaining hope is Johnny English, a rather unintelligent spy.

Popular.Title: Jodha Akbar
Popular.description: Jodha is a fiery Rajput princess who is obliged to marry a Mughal emperor, Akbar, for political reasons. Eventually, mutual respect and admiration lead to true love.

Popular.Title: Cobra Kai
Popular.description: Thirty four years after events of the 1984 All Valley Karate Tournament, a down-and-out Johnny Lawrence seeks redemption by reopening the infamous Cobra Kai dojo, reigniting his rivalry with a now successful Daniel LaRusso.

Popular.Title: Sounds Like Love
Popular.description: At 30-years-old, Maca is wasting her talent, but two of her friends, Jimena and Adriana, make everything possible in Madrid. Everything seems to be going well, until Leo, her biggest love and her biggest mistake, comes back into her life.

Popular.Title: Little Things
Popular.description: A cohabitating couple in their 20s navigates the ups and downs of work, modern-day relationships and finding themselves in contemporary Mumbai.

Popular.Title: Two and a Half Men
Popular.description: Charlie Harper is a jingle writer who leads a hedonistic, carefree life. Everything changes when his good-for-nothing brother, Alan, and 10-year-old nephew, Jake, move into his Malibu beach house.

Popular.Title: The Holiday
Popular.description: Two girls from different countries swap homes for the holidays to get away from their relationship issues. However, their lives change unexpectedly when they meet and fall in love with two local guys.

Popular.Title: The Intern
Popular.description: Ben Whittaker, a 70-year-old widower, realises that he is not cut out for retirement. He then applies to become a senior intern for a sceptical boss at an online fashion site.

Popular.Title: Jab We Met
Popular.description: Aditya, a heartbroken business tycoon, aimlessly boards a train to escape his depressing life. He meets Geet, a bubbly Punjabi girl, and gets pulled into her crazy life.

Popular.Title: Johnny English Reborn
Popular.description: A bumbling British secret agent is sent to fight an international group of assassins and unravel a conspiracy involving the Russian secret police, the CIA and the MI-7 itself.

trending.Title: FRIENDS
trending.description: Follow the lives of six reckless adults living in Manhattan, as they indulge in adventures which make their lives both troublesome and happening.

trending.Title: Turning Point
trending.description: his unflinching series documents the 9/11 terrorist attacks, from Al Qaeda's roots in the 1980s to America's response, both at home and abroad

trending.Title: Dil Dhadakne Do
trending.description: On the occasion of their 30th anniversary, Kamal and Neelam invite their family and friends on a cruise. However, on the journey, they learn many life lessons and change for the better.

trending.Title: TEEN WOLF
trending.description: Scott McCall, an awkward teen, turns into a werewolf after being bitten by one a day before sophomore year. He must learn to adapt to his new identity while handling life as a teenager.

trending.Title: Ted
trending.description: A hard-partying, foul-mouthed teddy bear come to life threatens to derail his human companion's attempts to enter adulthood and marry his girlfriend. Starring:Mark Wahlberg, Mila Kunis, Seth MacFarlane.

trending.Title: Jumanji
trending.description: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle is a 2017 American fantasy adventure comedy film directed by Jake Kasdan, co-written by Chris McKenna, Erik Sommers, Scott Rosenberg, and Jeff Pinkner, and starring Dwayne Johnson, Jack Black, Kevin Hart, Karen Gillan, Nick Jonas, and Bobby Cannavale.

trending.Title: House of Secrets: The Burari Deaths
trending.description: From incorporating the many conspiracy theories, to revealing the actual truth, the docu-series unravels like a work of fiction, backed by a solid screenplay. But its execution is hampered by the short-sightedness of its creators.

trending.Title: Maid
trending.description: Single mother Alex turns to housecleaning to make ends meet as she escapes an abusive relationship and overcomes homelessness to create a better life for her daughter, Maddy.

trending.Title: Squid game
trending.description: Hundreds of cash-strapped contestants accept an invitation to compete in children's games for a tempting prize, but the stakes are deadly.

trending.Title: Lucifer
trending.description: Based on characters created by Neil Gaiman, Sam Kieth and Mike Dringenberg, this series follows Lucifer, the original fallen angel, who has become dissatisfied with his life in hell.

trending.Title: The Dark Knight
trending.description: After Gordon, Dent and Batman begin an assault on Gotham's organised crime, the mobs hire the Joker, a psychopathic criminal mastermind who offers to kill Batman and bring the city to its knees.

trending.Title: The Hangover
trending.description: Doug and his three best men go to Las Vegas to celebrate his bachelor party. However, the three best men wake up the next day with a hangover and realise that Doug is missing.

trending.Title: The Wedding Ringer
trending.description: Doug Harris is getting married in two weeks and has no groomsmen because of his social awkwardness. He calls the owner of Best Man. Inc for help and forms a bond with him.

trending.Title: The Big Bang Theory
trending.description: The lives of four socially awkward friends, Leonard, Sheldon, Howard and Raj, take a wild turn when they meet the beautiful and free-spirited Penny

trending.Title: Conversations with a Killer: The Ted Bundy Tapes
trending.description: Ted Bundy was one of America's most notorious serial killers. He was convicted in the deaths of more than 30 women before being caught in 1978.

TV.Title: Munna Bhai M.B.B.S.
TV.description: Munna is a goon who sets out to fulfil his father's dream of becoming a doctor. With some help from his ally, Circuit, he enrols himself in a medical college and drives Dr Asthana up the wall.

TV.Title: Now You See Me 2
TV.description: The Four Horsemen, a group of illusionists, find themselves in Macau, China, planning to pull off a heist on the orders of a devious tech genius.

TV.Title: TEEN WOLF
TV.description: Scott McCall, an awkward teen, turns into a werewolf after being bitten by one a day before sophomore year. He must learn to adapt to his new identity while handling life as a teenager.

TV.Title: Baazaar
TV.description: An amateur stock trader, Rizwan, goes to Mumbai and works for the successful Gujarati trader, Shakun Kothari. Everything seems to be going smooth until Rizwan faces betrayal from his idol.

TV.Title: The Social Network
TV.description: Mark Zuckerberg creates a social networking site, Facebook, with his friend Eduardo's help. Though it turns out to be a successful venture, he severs ties with several people along the way.

TV.Title: Following her father's murder, a revenge-driven woman puts her trust in a powerful crime boss -- and enters the force under his direction.

TV.alt: greatest events of world war two-image
TV.Title: Greatest Events of WWII in Colour
TV.description: A series of colorized archive footage of important events during World War II.

TV.Title: Lucifer
TV.description: Based on characters created by Neil Gaiman, Sam Kieth and Mike Dringenberg, this series follows Lucifer, the original fallen angel, who has become dissatisfied with his life in hell.

TV.Title: Explained
TV.description: News site Vox is behind this series that puts the spotlight on topical issues that impact people's lives. The docuseries -- which features episodes that generally range from 15 to 20 minutes in length -- aims to dig deeper into topics, questions and ideas that aren't often part of the daily news

TV.Title: Stranger Things
TV.description: In 1980s Indiana, a group of young friends witness supernatural forces and secret government exploits. As they search for answers, the children unravel a series of extraordinary mysteries.

TV.Title: Never Have I Ever
TV.description: After a traumatic year, a first-generation Indian-American teenager wants to improve her status at school, but friends, family, and feelings don't make it easy on her.

TV.Title: Formula 1: Drive to Survive
TV.description: The drivers, managers and team owners in Formula 1 live life in the fast lane -- both on and off the track. This docuseries gives viewers exclusive, intimate access to the people in one of the world's greatest racing competitions.

TV.Title: The Walking Dead
TV.description: Sheriff Deputy Rick Grimes wakes up from a coma to learn the world is in ruins and must lead a group of survivors to stay alive.

TV.Title: The Vampire Diaries
TV.description: On her first day at high school, Elena meets Stefan and immediately feels a connection with him. However, what she does not know is that Stefan and his brother, Damon, are in fact vampires.

TV.Title: Sex and the City
TV.description: Carrie, Miranda, Samantha and Charlotte are four smart and dynamic New York-based women, who despite their differences and ever-changing sex lives stick together through the ups and downs.

TV.Title: Kota Factory
TV.description: Like many students from across India, Vaibhav comes to Kota to prepare for JEE and NEET. Along with his friends, he navigates campus life and works hard to get into IIT.

TV.Title: Sex Education
TV.description: Socially awkward high school student Otis may not have much experience in the lovemaking department, but he gets good guidance on the topic in his personal sex ed course -- living with mom Jean, who is a sex therapist.

TV.Title: Love & Other Drugs
TV.description: Pharmaceutical sales representative and serial womaniser Jake Randall meets his match in Maggie, a young woman who suffers from early-onset Parkinson's disease, just as his career begins to skyrocket.

TV.Title: TWake Up Sid
TV.description: Siddharth Mehra, a spoilt and selfish college student, learns the meaning of life and the importance of responsibility from Aisha, an aspiring writer from Kolkata.

Blockbuster.Title: Baahubali: The Beginning
Blockbuster.description: n the kingdom of Mahishmati, Shivudu falls in love with a young warrior woman. While trying to woo her, he learns about the conflict-ridden past of his family and his true legacy.

Blockbuster.Title: Jaane Tu... Ya Jaane Na
Blockbuster.description: Best friends Jai and Aditi make for a perfect couple but refuse to consider a romantic relationship. However, when they start dating other people, they realise that they are actually in love.

Blockbuster.Title: Batman Begins
Blockbuster.description: After witnessing his parents' death, Bruce learns the art of fighting to confront injustice. When he returns to Gotham as Batman, he must stop a secret society that intends to destroy the city.

Blockbuster.Title: Lucifer
Blockbuster.description: Based on characters created by Neil Gaiman, Sam Kieth and Mike Dringenberg, this series follows Lucifer, the original fallen angel, who has become dissatisfied with his life in hell.

Blockbuster.Title: Wild Wild Country
Blockbuster.description: When a controversial guru builds a utopian city in the Oregon desert, it causes a massive conflict with local ranchers. This docuseries chronicles the conflict, which leads to the first bioterror attack in the United States and a massive case of illegal wiretapping.

Blockbuster.Title: Queen
Blockbuster.description: Rani is devastated after her fiance leaves her just before the wedding. Undeterred, she decides to go on their honeymoon alone where she gets pulled out of her comfort zone and rediscovers herself.

Blockbuster.Title: Comedy Premium League
Blockbuster.description: With sketches, debates and roasts, 16 of India's funniest entertainers compete in teams to be named the ultimate comedy champions.

Blockbuster.Title: Yeh Jawani Hai Diwani
Blockbuster.description: Kabir and Naina meet during a trekking trip where she falls in love with him but refrains from expressing it. They soon drift apart but end up meeting at a friend's wedding.

Blockbuster.Title: Panipat
Blockbuster.description: When Ahmad Shah Abdali, the king of Afghanistan, announces war, the army chief of the Marathas, Sadashivrao Bhau, gets ready for the battle by overcoming several obstacles.

Blockbuster.Title: The Karate Kid
Blockbuster.description: The Karate Kid is a 1984 American martial arts drama film written by Robert Mark Kamen and directed by John G. Avildsen. It is the first installment in the Karate Kid franchise, and stars Ralph Macchio, Pat Morita, Elisabeth Shue and Billy Zabka.

Blockbuster.Title: Conversations with a Killer: The Ted Bundy Tapes
Blockbuster.description: Ted Bundy was one of America's most notorious serial killers. He was convicted in the deaths of more than 30 women before being caught in 1978.

Blockbuster.Title: Lagaan
Blockbuster.description: During the British Raj, a farmer named Bhuvan accepts the challenge of Captain Andrew Russell to beat his team in a game of cricket and enable his village to not pay taxes for the next three years.

Blockbuster.Title: Baahubali 2: The Conclusion
Blockbuster.description: After learning that his father was brutally killed by Bhallaladeva, Mahendra Baahubali raises an army to defeat him and release his mother from the former's captivity.

Blockbuster.Title: Do Dooni Chaar
Blockbuster.description: The Duggal family wants to raise their standard of living. Now, it is up to the head of the family, who is a school teacher, to make the most of the opportunity that comes knocking at his door.

Blockbuster.Title: Rush Hour 3
Blockbuster.description: Inspector Lee and LAPD detective James Carter travel to Paris to protect a French witness from the attacks of the Chinese triads. The two battle it out against the world's most deadly criminals.
